document_data.name: ''Bullet of Crushing''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bullets of crushing''''' were a type of [[enchanted]] [[sling]] ammunition.
document_data.Powers: ''Bullets of crushing'' appeared to be ordinary sling bullets at firs glance. However their enchantments become evident the moment one of these bullets hit their target. Upon collision, ''bullets of crushing'' instantly expanded to a size of a boulder, crushing them.
document_data.History: By late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''bullets of crushing'' could be found in the city of [[Hillsfar]] of the [[Moonsea]] region.
